Package org.melior.client.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConnectionFactory<C extends ClientConfig,T extends Connection<C,T,P>,P>
    Base class for factories that produce connection objects on behalf of remoting clients.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientConfig
    Common configuration parameters used by remoting clients.
    ClientObject<C extends ClientConfig,T extends ExceptionTarget,P>
    Base class for managed objects that form part of a remoting client, but that are not connection objects.
    Connection<C extends ClientConfig,T extends Connection<C,T,P>,P>
    Base class for connection objects that are produced by a connection factory on behalf of a remoting client.
    RawAwarePayload
    Base class for String-based client payloads that wish to make their raw content visible in addition to there processed POJO content.
